languages.text: {n}Биомеханическая тварь слабо сучит конечностями. Ее тело изломано и покрыто следами битвы, но, похоже, никто не собирается его ремонтировать. Под треснувшим панцирем видно блестящее мясо, пронизанное жгутами проводов. Бронепластины тяжело вздымаются, и существо издает тоскливый, исполненный сожаления скрип-вздох.{/n}

{n}The biomechanical creature is flailing its limbs faintly. Its body is broken and bears the signs of combat, but it seems no one is planning to repair it. You can see the glistening flesh under the cracked carapace and the bunches of wires that permeate it. The armour plates rise heavily and the creature emits a wistful, creaking sigh full of regret.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Биомеханическая тварь слабо сучит конечностями. Ее тело изломано и покрыто следами битвы, но, похоже, никто не собирается его ремонтировать. Под треснувшим панцирем видно блестящее мясо, пронизанное жгутами проводов. Бронепластины тяжело вздымаются, и существо издает тоскливый, исполненный сожаления скрип-вздох.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The biomechanical creature is flailing its limbs weakly. Its body is broken and bears the signs battle, but it does not look like there is anyone to repair it. You can see the glistening flesh under the cracked carapace and the bunches of wires that permeate it. The armour plates rise heavily, and the creature emits a wistful, creaking sigh full of regret.{/n}

You can see the glistening flesh under the cracked carapace and the bunches of wires that permeate it. The armour plates rise heavily and the creature emits a wistful, creaking sigh full of regret.{/n}

{n}The biomechanical creature is flailing its limbs faintly. Its body is broken and bears the signs of combat, but it seems no one is planning to repair it. You can see the glistening flesh under the cracked carapace and the bunches of wires that permeate it. The armour plates rise heavily and the creature emits a wistful, creaking sigh full of regret.{/n}

languages.text: {n}バイオメカニカルな生き物がかすかに手足を動かしている。その体は壊れ、戦闘で消耗した跡があるが、誰も修理するつもりはないようだ。ひび割れた甲殻の下に輝く肉体と、それを貫くワイヤーの束が見える。装甲板が重々しく浮き上がり、生き物は後悔の念に満ちた、軋むようなため息をついた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The biomechanical creature is flailing its limbs faintly. Its body is broken and bears the signs of combat, but it seems no one is planning to repair it. You can see the glistening flesh under the cracked carapace and the bunches of wires that permeate it. The armour plates rise heavily and the creature emits a wistful, creaking sigh full of regret.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}バイオメカニカルな生き物がかすかに手足を動かしている。その体は壊れ、戦闘で消耗した跡があるが、誰も修理するつもりはないようだ。ひび割れた甲殻の下に輝く肉体と、それを貫くワイヤーの束が見える。装甲板が重々しく浮き上がり、生き物は後悔の念に満ちた、軋むようなため息をついた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}这只机械生物的四肢正在微弱地抽搐着。它的躯体已经残破不堪，满是战斗磨损的痕迹，但似乎根本没人打算把它修好。你看到它龟裂的外壳下面闪闪发光的肉体与渗透其中的无数电线。怪物沉重地抬起盔甲，发出了吱吱作响的叹息，充满了遗憾与渴望。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The biomechanical creature is flailing its limbs faintly. Its body is broken and bears the signs of combat, but it seems no one is planning to repair it. You can see the glistening flesh under the cracked carapace and the bunches of wires that permeate it. The armour plates rise heavily and the creature emits a wistful, creaking sigh full of regret.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这只机械生物的四肢正在微弱地抽搐着。它的躯体已经残破不堪，满是战斗磨损的痕迹，但似乎没人能修好它。你看到它龟裂的外壳下面闪闪发光的肉体与渗透其中的无数电线。怪物沉重地抬起盔甲，发出了吱吱作响的叹息，充满了遗憾与渴望。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La criatura biomecánica agita débilmente sus extremidades. Su cuerpo está roto y presenta los signos del combate, pero no parece que haya nadie con intención de repararla. Se puede ver la carne reluciente bajo el caparazón agrietado y los manojos de cables que lo recorren. Las placas de la armadura se levantan pesadamente y la criatura emite un suspiro melancólico y chirriante lleno de pesar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The biomechanical creature is flailing its limbs faintly. Its body is broken and bears the signs of combat, but it seems no one is planning to repair it. You can see the glistening flesh under the cracked carapace and the bunches of wires that permeate it. The armour plates rise heavily and the creature emits a wistful, creaking sigh full of regret.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La criatura biomecánica agita débilmente sus extremidades. Su cuerpo está roto y presenta los signos del desgaste del combate, pero no parece que haya nadie que pueda repararla. Se puede ver la carne reluciente bajo el caparazón agrietado y los manojos de cables que lo recorren. Las placas de la armadura se levantan pesadamente y la criatura emite un suspiro melancólico y chirriante lleno de pesar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die biomechanische Kreatur wedelt leicht mit ihren Gliedmaßen. Ihr Körper ist gebrochen und vom Kampf gezeichnet, aber niemand scheint vorzuhaben, sie zu reparieren. Du siehst unter dem aufgebrochenen Panzer das nasse Fleisch und die Kabelstränge, die es durchziehen. Die Rüstungsplatten heben sich schwer und die Kreatur stößt ein wehmütiges, quietschendes Seufzen voller Bedauern aus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The biomechanical creature is flailing its limbs faintly. Its body is broken and bears the signs of combat, but it seems no one is planning to repair it. You can see the glistening flesh under the cracked carapace and the bunches of wires that permeate it. The armour plates rise heavily and the creature emits a wistful, creaking sigh full of regret.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die biomechanische Kreatur wedelt leicht mit den Gliedmaßen. Ihr Körper ist zerbrochen und vom Kampf zerschlissen, doch es sieht nicht aus, als gäbe es jemanden, der sie reparieren könnte. Du siehst unter dem aufgebrochenen Panzer das nasse Fleisch und die Kabelstränge, die es durchziehen. Die Rüstungsplatten heben sich schwer und die Kreatur stößt ein wehmütiges, quietschendes Seufzen voller Bedauern aus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La créature biomécanique agite légèrement ses membres et laisse échapper un long soupir de regret. Son corps brisé a été marqué par de nombreux combats, sans que personne ne semble compter la réparer. Sous sa carapace fendue parcourue d'un enchevêtrement de câbles et de fils, vous apercevez des bribes de sa peau chatoyante, tandis que ses plaques d'armure se soulèvent au rythme lourd de sa respiration.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The biomechanical creature is flailing its limbs faintly. Its body is broken and bears the signs of combat, but it seems no one is planning to repair it. You can see the glistening flesh under the cracked carapace and the bunches of wires that permeate it. The armour plates rise heavily and the creature emits a wistful, creaking sigh full of regret.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La créature biomécanique agite légèrement ses membres et laisse échapper un long soupir de regret. Son corps brisé a été marqué par les nombreux combats auxquels elle a dû participer, sans que personne ne semble avoir été capable de la réparer. Sous sa carapace fendue parcourue d'un enchevêtrement de câbles et de fils, vous apercevez des bribes de sa peau chatoyante, tandis que ses plaques d'armure se soulèvent au rythme lourd de sa respiration.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Biyomekanik yaratık, uzuvlarını belli belirsiz hareket ettiriyor. Bedeni perişan hâlde ve üzeri, çatışmalardan kalma izlerle dolu ancak kimsenin onu onarmak gibi bir planı varmış gibi durmuyor. Çatlak karapaksın altındaki parlayan eti ve içine işlemiş kablo buketlerini görebiliyorsun. Zırh plakalar ağır ağır yükseliyor ve yaratık, hüzün ve özlem dolu, gıcırtılı bir iç çekiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The biomechanical creature is flailing its limbs faintly. Its body is broken and bears the signs of combat, but it seems no one is planning to repair it. You can see the glistening flesh under the cracked carapace and the bunches of wires that permeate it. The armour plates rise heavily and the creature emits a wistful, creaking sigh full of regret.{/n}
